abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Private Sector
            Development Support Project for Afghanistan is to improve
            the investment climate in Afghanistan for foreign and
            domestic firms by : enhance the provision of land and
            infrastructural services for enterprise development; enhance
            the capacity of government agencies to analyze PSD issues,
            and develop and implement PSD-related strategies, policies
            and programs; and enhance the capacity of government
            agencies to promote Afghanistan as an investment destination
            and provide investment facilitation services. This
            Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) document evaluated
            impacts and suggests mitigation measures in the following
            areas : road network; storm water drainage; air quality;
            noise levels; topography; soil contamination; seismology;
            solid waste management system; hydrogeology; loss of
            endangered species both flora and fauna; wastewater
            collection and disposal system; water resources; surface and
            ground water quality; religious, archeological monuments and
            historical sites findings; health, safety and environmental
            procedures; institutional arrangement for implementation of
            the EIA; on-job training and training centers; employment
            opportunities; finally, applicability of Afghanistan's
            National policy and administrative framework, law on private
            investment in Afghanistan, environmental policy Act, land
            acquisition Act, and the Bank's operational safeguard
            directives on environmental and social matters
